TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: The <color=lightblue>Ash Twin Project</color> was created to find the <color=lightblue>Eye of the Universe</color>. This was to be done by linking it to the <color=lightblue>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> and repeatedly firing probes into space in random directions until the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> was found.
SOLANUM: Finding and going to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is my clan's ultimate aim. It is a pity, then, that the <color=lightblue>Ash Twin Project</color> never bore fruit.
